androidx.leanback.widget

Class TitleView

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrameLayout
      • androidx.leanback.widget.TitleView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TitleViewAdapter.Provider

    public class TitleView
extends FrameLayout
implements TitleViewAdapter.Provider
    Title view for a leanback fragment.

      • updateComponentsVisibility

        public void updateComponentsVisibility(int flags)
        Based on the flag, it updates the visibility of the individual components - BadgeView, TextView and SearchView.
        Parameters:
        flags - integer representing the visibility of TitleView components.
        See Also:
        TitleViewAdapter.SEARCH_VIEW_VISIBLE, TitleViewAdapter.BRANDING_VIEW_VISIBLE, TitleViewAdapter.FULL_VIEW_VISIBLE

      • getTitleViewAdapter

        public TitleViewAdapter getTitleViewAdapter()
        Description copied from interface: TitleViewAdapter.Provider
        Returns TitleViewAdapter to be implemented by the customized widget class.
        Specified by:
        getTitleViewAdapter in interface TitleViewAdapter.Provider
        Returns:
        TitleViewAdapter to be implemented by the customized widget class.
